ModMetaData.name: Dining Etiquette (食有定时)
ModMetaData.author: YourName
ModMetaData.description:
Adds a new "Meal Time" schedule block.
During Meal Time, pawns will: 1. Eat a proper meal if hungry. 2. Have a light snack or hot drink if slightly hungry (to prevent waste). 3. Sit at a table and socialize if not hungry.
Integrates with "Hundred Culinary Arts" for enhanced item names.
